TLDR; There's no “right class,” right country or even right continent. There are simply individuals yearning for a better life in America. That’s what the poem was back then, that’s what the poem is today & that’s what the poem will be so long as #America exists.

Tuesday on @NPR, @USCISCuccinelli, Acting Director of our agency meant to oversee #immigration, explained the poem referred to immigrants who can “stand on their own two feet." He later went on LIVE television to DEFEND “that poem was referring back to people coming from Europe.”

At 1:27pm that day, I quoted the base of the Statue of Liberty in a tweet ⬇ to remind certain individuals what exactly it is that America stands for & the grounds for why I’m cosponsoring legislation to block this rule. https://twitter.com/NydiaVelazquez/status/1160966105101406209?s=20 …

#ICYMI:
